Title: Bosch
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick
Plot: An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
